title: Forestry in South Africa
creator_credit: Film Services and South African Government
brief_description: Stresses the economic importance of timber. Surveys the limited areas of indigenous forests to be found in South Africa which are of any commercial value; portrays various forest activities including re-afforestation; nursery plantation, transplantation; removal of unwanted growths; thinning; protection against fire; felling; mill sawing.
